translation.title: Who Should Have a Novice as Attendant

segments.en: 253. Who Should Have a Novice as Attendant

segments.pli: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
segments.en: “Mendicants, a novice should attend on a mendicant with five qualities.

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asekhena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato hoti; asekhena samādhikkhandhena … asekhena paññākkhandhena … asekhena vimuttikkhandhena … asekhena vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhena samannāgato hoti.
segments.en: It’s a mendicant who has the entire spectrum of an adept’s ethics, immersion, wisdom, freedom, and the knowledge and vision of freedom.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo”ti.
segments.en: A novice should attend on a mendicant with these five qualities.”
